EmailTemplate.subject: Correction to your graduation date

Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Further to our email of 9 October, we would like to apologise for the error contained within it. The email invited you to graduation on 26 October. This was an error. The correct graduation date is 29 October, not 26 October. We apologise for the confusion and any inconvenience that this has caused.
We confirm that the correct date of your graduation is 29 October.
We would be very grateful if you could re-confirm your attendance at graduation by clicking on the link below.
http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=puih2mlmy2m85
We apologise once again for the confusion and any inconvenience caused.
Where: Coventry Central Hall Warwick Lane Coventry CV1 2HA
When: 29/10/2011
13:30 - 16:30
